config.churismobscaling.title: Churi's Mob Scaling
config.churismobscaling.enable_mod.toolt: Enable or disable the mod completely
config.churismobscaling.max_level.toolti: The maximum level a mob can reach
config.churismobscaling.noise_scale.tool: Controls the size of level regions (higher values = larger regions)
config.churismobscaling.min_noise_level_: The minimum percentage of the max level from noise (0.25 = 25%)
config.churismobscaling.spawn_influence_: Distance in blocks from spawn where difficulty scaling begins
config.churismobscaling.min_total_health: Minimum health modifier at level 1 (-0.9 = 10% of normal health)
config.churismobscaling.max_total_health: Maximum health modifier at max level (10.0 = 11x normal health)
config.churismobscaling.min_total_attack: Minimum attack modifier at level 1 (-0.9 = 10% of normal damage)
config.churismobscaling.max_total_attack: Maximum attack modifier at max level (5.0 = 6x normal damage)
config.churismobscaling.min_total_loot_b: Minimum loot modifier at level 1 (-0.9 = 10% of normal loot)
config.churismobscaling.max_total_loot_b: Maximum loot modifier at max level (4.0 = 5x normal loot)
config.churismobscaling.loot_bonus_affec: If enabled, XP drops will be scaled by loot multiplier instead of dedicated XP multiplier
config.churismobscaling.min_total_xp_bon: Minimum XP modifier at level 1 (-0.5 = 50% of normal XP)
config.churismobscaling.max_total_xp_bon: Maximum XP modifier at max level (4.0 = 5x normal XP)
config.churismobscaling.enable_mob_label: Toggle the display of the mob information HUD when looking at entities
config.churismobscaling.mob_label_hud_sc: Adjust the size of the mob information HUD (0.5 = smaller, 2.0 = larger)
config.churismobscaling.mob_label_hud_du: How long the mob HUD stays visible after looking away (in milliseconds)
config.churismobscaling.enable_location_: Toggle the display of the current location's level on the screen
config.churismobscaling.location_level_h: Adjust the size of the location level HUD (0.5 = smaller, 2.0 = larger)
Where to display the location level HUD on the screen
